common.error.404.title: Oops, something went wrong.
common.error.404.desc: Sorry, we couldn't find your page.
common.error.401: Session has expired, log in again
settings.profile.title: Profile
settings.secrity.password.title: Change password
settings.secrity.2fa.title: Two-factor authentication
settings.secrity.2fa.desc: Two-factor authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to sign in.
settings.secrity.2fa.notenabled: Two-factor authentication has not been enabled yet
settings.secrity.2fa.methods.title: Two-factor methods
settings.secrity.2fa.methods.authenticat: Use the Authenticator application to obtain the tow-factor authentication code, e.g.
settings.secrity.2fa.recoveryoptions.rec: Recovery codes can be used to access your account in the event you lose access to your device and cannot receive two-factor authentication codes.
settings.loginlogs.title: Login logs
settings.2fa.recoverycodes.title: Two-factor recovery codes
settings.2fa.recoverycodes.secondary.des: Keep your recovery codes as safe as your password. We recommend saving them with a password manager such as 1Password, Authy, or Keeper.
settings.2fa.recoverycodes.tips.main: Keep your recovery codes in a safe spot.
settings.2fa.recoverycodes.tips.secondar: These codes are the last resort for accessing your account in case you lose your password and second factors. If you cannot find these codes, you will lose access to your accoun.
settings.2fa.recoverycodes.copied.messag: The recovery codes has been copied to the clipboard!
settings.2fa.recoverycodes.generatenew.t: When you generate new recovery codes, you must save the new codes. Your old codes won't work anymore.
account.login.desc.text: Welcome back! Please enter your details
account.login.input.username.label: Username
account.login.input.password.label: Password
account.login.input.rememberMe.label: Stay signed in
account.login.aggreement.html: By signing in, I agree to the Privacy Statement and Terms of Service.
account.loginwith2fa.desc.text: Open your two-factor authenticator (TOTP) app or browser extension to view your authentication code.
account.loginwith2fa.link.useRecoveryCod: Use a recovery code or begin 2FA account recovery
account.loginwithrecoverycode.desc.text: If you are unable to access your mobile device, enter one of your recovery codes to verify your identity.
account.resetpassword.desc.text: Enter the email address associated with your account. We’ll send you a link to reset your password.
